definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: give a present, bribe (Sir 35:14; Aram. [[שְׁחַד]], 4h.d bribe; perh. also As. šidê, gifts, Dl:WB 643);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 2 fs., acc. pers. [[וַתִּשְׁחֳדִי אוֹתָם]] Ez Eze 16:33 thou didst bribe them to come ([[לָבוֹא]]; ‖[[נׇתַן נְדָנִים ]]); rd. prob. also Inf. cstr. sf. [[שַׁחֲדָהּ]] Is 47:11 to buy it off (for MT [[שַׁחְרָהּ]], so Kr Gr Buhl Che:Hpt Heb 142, cf. Marti; v. Pr 6:35); Imv. mpl. [[שִׁחֲדוּ בַעֲדִי]] (Ges:§ 64 a) Job 6:22 give a bribe for me.
